condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Al 2025, las autoridades nacionales, provinciales y municipales, la sociedad civil y el sector privado mejoran sus capacidades paragenerar una oferta de servicios de primera infancia inclusiva, suficiente, articulada, con distribucion equitativa en el territorioy de calidad.

description.narrative: UNICEF substantially contributed to early childhood´s agenda by strengthening national and prioritized provincial governments. Progress was made in developing actions related to strengthening the services supply and capacities of early childhood services personnel. Actions to design new activities to enhance services for early childhood at the municipal level through MUNA strategies were developed. Evidence generation and advocacy to enhance quality and expand ECD services has been promoted with new governmental authorities. | Status:Met | As-of Date:14/01/2022
